oya lama niwasa walata aluth namak aawa me lagadi unu prashneth ekkala eeka thama bebi pam,eeka nikan hariyata ara broyilar kukullu athi karanawa wage deyak eeken ape rate minissu agewwe, lamayi athi karala rata patawanna kiyala,ooken aththatama podiyata aagam prashnayak eliyata damme,aththatama ethanin une anatha unu ammalawa babala hambenakan ethana thiyan idala eyalata rakawaranaya dunnu eka,thaththek nathi daruwek ekka ee ammalata kiyakatawath ape samaje jiwath wenna ba, thaththek nathi daruwek aawe ayi kiyana eka wenama prashnayak, me weddi lama niwasa wala thadabadaya godak thiyanawa,mokada mama lama niwasa kipayakatama gihin eeka as deken dakka nisa,eeka aththatama loku prashnayak ape rate thiyana,minissu wadiya kathanokarana prashnayak, samaharawita ee ammala hithakin neme ne ehema lamayiwa lama niwasekata denne,nathnam ehema lankawe ho pitarataka kenekta hadaganna denne, ape samaje ehema daruwekwa hadaganna ba kiyakatawath,ninda apahasa gana kiyanna deyak na ne,ee wagema lankawe kawuruhari ehema daruwekwa hada gaththath ee lamayata hari welawak balala kiyanna balan inne uba hadaganna gaththa ekek,oya inne ube ammayi thaththayi neme kiyala, ee lamayawa kochchara hodata hadagaththath minissu balanne ee lamayata awajathakaya kiyana nama dennamayi.
